jobInfo.postDescription:
全职岗位，不能线下面试者请勿投递，感谢配合！

岗位职责：Job Responsibilities:
1、在主管工程师的指导下，负责试验室内各项试验数据的记录与分析；
Under the guidance of the engineer in charge, be responsible for the recording and analysis of various test data in the laboratory;
2、负责试验室设备、仪器的维护及保养，使试验工具保持良好的可用状态；
Responsible for the maintenance of laboratory equipment and instruments, so as to keep the test tools in good condition;
3、负责相关区域现场的EHS\7S及其他质量体系标准的落实，保持试验环境的有效性；
Responsible for the implementation of EHS\7S and other quality system standards on site in relevant areas, and maintain the effectiveness of the test environment;
4、接受公司对试验室体系、试验方法及结果判定等知识的培训，持续提高测试能力；
Accept the company's training on the laboratory system, test methods and result judgment, and continuously improve the testing ability;
5、在公司统一协调下进行岗位轮换，掌握各系统模块的综合试验技能与管理技能；
Carry out job rotation under the unified coordination of the company, and master the comprehensive test skills and management skills of each system module;
6、完成上级主管交办的其他临时性工作任务。
Complete other temporary tasks assigned by superior supervisors.

任职要求: Qualifications:
1、本科及以上学历，电子电气、自动化、机械、机电、高分子材料、新能源及其他工科类专业优秀毕业生；
Bachelor degree or above, outstanding graduates majoring in electronics, automation, machinery, electromechanical, polymer materials, new energy and other engineering majors;
2、英语CET-4以上，能够顺利阅读英文测试标准；
English CET-4 or above, able to read English test standards smoothly;
3、熟练操作Word, Excel , PPT等办公软件，掌握CAD, Labvie等试验室相关软件技能；
Proficiency in Word, Excel, PPT and other office software, master CAD, Labvie and other laboratory-related software skills;
4、性格开朗、有责任心、抗压能力强、有良好的沟通能力和团队合作精神。
Cheerful personality, sense of responsibility, strong ability to withstand pressure, good communication skills and teamwork spirit.

岗位发展：Job development:
项目管理 project management
管培生—助理工程师-—专员/初级工程师—高级专员/中级工程师技术管理
团队管理
Management trainee—assistant engineer—specialist/junior engineer—senior specialist/intermediate engineer technical management
team management
jobInfo.address: 苏州吴中区港田工业坊(港田路)17栋

brandComInfo.introduce:
STS have integrated by "sound, light, electricity, heat, power, chemistry, and communication" with core advantages is a quality service organizaton for vehicle , new energy , rail transit , industry product etc. 

      We located the headqarters in Suzhou China Industrial Park and has established many branches nationwide in ShangHai , Tian Jin around China , We provide  quality insurance and technical solutions for the global product supply chain which coverd the product full-life cycle testing and verification using international, national and enterprise standards and specifications in high-end equipment manufacturing industry and relevant fields for more than 13 years.

      With the continuous emergence of new technologies such as electrification, networking, intelligence and sharing in the wehicle industry and high-end equipment manufacturing industry, we will continue to improve the detection technology, strive to build a bridge of trust between OEM and the supply chain, ensure the quality through our proffesional test and verification for our customers.

       苏勃检测是一家汽车、新能源、轨道交通、航空航天等高端制造业及其部件研发验证、检测和标准服务的创新型第三方检测、检验等综合型质量认证机构。公司总部位于苏州工业园，全国建成了多个分支机构。

       公司熟谙相关领域的国际、国家和企业标准及规范，将核心优势的技术解决方案，集成为“声、光、电、热、力、化学、通讯“等于一体的试验平台，为全球汽车、新能源、工业产品领域整机及其零部件供应链提供全生命周期的测试验证等质量保证服务。

       随着高端制造业产业电气化、网络化、智能化、共享化等新技术不断涌现，公司将持续提升检测技术，试验能力，技术研发能力，通过专业的测试验证为客户提供高质量保证，致力于为OEM与供应链之间搭建信任的桥梁，助力制造业的健康、安全、环保的高质量发展。
服务热线：400 777 2758
